data.text: @alittleadd2 @JoyceWhiteVance Same here.   At my work, work emails chats and texts in company phone belong to company.

@JoyceWhiteVance I have a question about Eastman and using his university email account. Since the university could access his emails at their discretion, how could he have had any expectation of privacy? Therefore wouldn't attorney-client privilege be nonexistent?

@JoyceWhiteVance @KimberlyEAtkins Ok, so Joyce, about that espresso-machine thing, please don't ever again mention a brand of kitchen appliance I've never heard. It'll ensure I don't google the brand, which would (I've learned) inevitably cause me to keep seeing pop-ups of every appliance the brand makes. Thanks.
@JoyceWhiteVance YES - we are tired of being nice!! #consequences
@JoyceWhiteVance I absolutely love you, Joyce. Thanks for being a part of the #SistersinLaw podcast.
@JoyceWhiteVance And why do you think he will ever face the music? We do not have a DOJ. It is over for all practical purposes.
@JoyceWhiteVance @ComHealthNurIns #JohnEastman got #Covid again? Wear a mask dude. Get a vaccine, twit.
@JoyceWhiteVance Yes indeed. We look forward to his healthy recovery, so he can "pay the piper".
